resources.string: Each time 10 questions are randomly generated. Period progress will increase if answered correctly!
Do you really want to exit?
You absolutely nailed it!\nWere you resurrected from the Jurassic? Consider a career in paleontology!
Almost perfect!\nJust one tiny fossil slipped through your fingers.
You\'re really digging deep!\nJust a few more bones to uncover.
Lucky seven!\nYour brain might be part archaeopteryx.
Over half right!\nThat\’s more than a T. rex could count on its claws.
Right in the middle — a classic \‘I skimmed the textbook\’ score!
Not bad… unless you\'re grading on a prehistoric curve.
Three correct answers!\nAt least you\'re consistent with trilobites.
Two? That’s a dinosaur\'s IQ level… so you\'re not alone!
One lonely answer…\nBut hey, even the worst fossils become museum-worthy someday!
A perfect zero!\nYou\'ve just invented the extinct knowledge category.
Connection error! Please try again later.
Create an account and compete with the top paleontology enthusiasts!
Answer quiz questions - each correct answer gives you +1 XP. If you achieve a perfect score of 10 out of 10, your earned XP will be doubled!
Your username will be displayed on the leaderboard.
Leaderboard participation is a paid feature. All proceeds will be used to improve the application and add new content.
What was the mean surface temperature range during the Hadean Eon?
